mapper.insert: /** cardBilling */ insert into tb_card_auth ( cpid, orderno, producttype, billtype, taxfreecd, amount, cardno, cardcode, quota, ipaddress, userphone, userid, username, email, productname, resultcode, errormessage, daoutrx, authno, authdate, paymenttype ) values ( #{cpid}, #{orderno}, #{producttype}, #{billtype}, #{taxfreecd}, #{amount}, #{cardno}, #{cardcode}, #{quota}, #{ipaddress}, #{userphone}, #{userid}, #{username}, #{email}, #{productname}, #{resultcode}, #{errormessage}, #{daoutrx}, #{authno}, #{authdate}, '1' )

/** cardBillingLink */ insert into tb_card_auth ( cpid, orderno, producttype, billtype, taxfreecd, amount, userphone, userid, username, email, productname, paymenttype, sms_quota ) values ( #{cpid}, #{orderno}, #{producttype}, #{billtype}, #{taxfreecd}, #{amount}, #{userphone}, #{userid}, #{username}, #{email}, #{productname}, '2', #{sms_quota} )
mapper.select: /** selectCardBillingLink */ select no, cpid, orderno, producttype, billtype, taxfreecd, amount, userphone, username, email, productname, resultcode, sms_quota, userid from tb_card_auth where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: /** cardCancel */ insert into tb_card_cancel ( cpid, daoutrx, amount, cancelmemo, canceltype, created_id, created_datetime ) values ( #{cpid}, #{daoutrx}, #{amount}, #{cancelmemo}, #{canceltype}, #{created_id}, now() )

/** cardTerminal */ insert into tb_pay_notice ( cpid, daoutrx, settdate, authno, amount, tip, tax, terminalid, agentno, cardtype, allotmon, cardcode, cardname, buycode, cardno, paymenttype ) values( #{cpid}, #{daoutrx}, #{settdate}, #{authno}, #{amount}, #{tip}, #{tax}, #{terminalid}, #{agentno}, #{cardtype}, #{allotmon}, #{cardcode}, (select cardname from tb_card_code where cardcode = #{cardcode}), #{buycode}, #{cardno}, #{paymenttype} )

/** shopCard */ insert into tb_pay_notice ( cpid, daoutrx, settdate, authno, amount, cardcode, cardname, cardno, paymenttype ) values( #{cpid}, #{daoutrx}, #{settdate}, #{authno}, #{amount}, #{cardcode}, (select cardname from tb_card_code where cardcode = #{cardcode}), #{cardno}, #{paymenttype} )

/** cardTerminalCancel */ insert into tb_card_cancel ( cpid, daoutrx, amount, cancelmemo, canceltype, created_id, created_datetime ) values ( #{cpid}, #{daoutrx}, #{amount}, #{cancelmemo}, #{canceltype}, #{created_id}, #{canceldate} )
